column5: Got up at 530 sharp and got coffee brewing. Plan this morning was to have coffee on the deck and watch these majestic creatures jumping throughout the river. Pretty chilly this am but the river is glass:) i hear birds all over, watching loons chase the baitfish, in between those sounds come large splashes of the mighty sturgeon. Mostly smaller fish so far, but a few big ones too! Pelicans already poised at the rapids, and on a steep rock on the American side, awaiting a feed. Two bald eagles are also out this am, and one hawk:) coffee is good, life is good:) good morning OFC
Can't think of a nicer way to start a day !!
Top of the hat to you this morning dude.  cheers HD
That's a great way to start your day!!
